channel.title: Oakley Evade OX5031 – Men’s Designer Eyewear
channel.description: Jim Jannard, an inventor from California, started his own business in 1975 with the intention of designing and creating products that worked and looked better than anything else available at the time. With just $300, he started up his own business in his garage. Jannard’s first major breakthrough was designing an extremely effective motorcycle grip [...]
